sentences.sContent: Her father was laid in a cemetery.
sentences.sContent_eng: Her father was laid in a cemetery.
sentences.sCn: 她父亲安葬在一处公墓。

sentences.sContent: The body was interred at that cemetery.
sentences.sContent_eng: The body was interred at that cemetery.

sentences.sContent: He rests in a cemetery in the western suburbs of Beijing.
sentences.sContent_eng: He rests in a cemetery in the western suburbs of Beijing.
sentences.sCn: 他长眠于北京西郊的一个公墓中。

remMethod.val: 彗星(comet)撞地球， 人类的坟墓(cemetery)

trans.tranOther: a piece of land, usually not belonging to a church, in which dead people are buried
